events.name: Merry Ruby Christmas!
events.description:
3.times { puts "Ho!" } - It's Christmas again!  It's been a great year of Ruby meetups, Rails Girls and RedDotRubyConf so let's kick back, relax a little and celebrate in December! Come join us for food and drinks on Tuesday, 22 Dec at Tinkerbox Studios to celebrate the holiday season and the year we've had! To make things a little special this time round, we'll be doing a panel session with some of Singapore's long time Rubyists. Come hear from them on their love for Ruby/Rails, how are they using Ruby/Rails, and whether Ruby/Rails has affected their hiring AND valuation! Panelists: - Dinesh Raju, CEO @ ReferralCandy- Michael Cheng, Engineer @ Neo- Sam Hon, Founder @ FlowHero- Ryan Law, Engineer @ GrabTaxi We are still looking for more food and drinks sponsor. Please get in touch with us if you would like to sponsor. Thank you sponsors! -------------- Job Postings -------------- Are you looking for Rubyists? Do you have a job posting? Email us a blurb (< 50 words) + link and we'll put it here. 1. We have a wonderful opportunity with us at CSC . We are looking for Architects(Software) who have experience with Ruby on Rails in the recent past. 8 plus of overall experience is preferred.If anyone interested they can send cvs to ssaba@csc.com.  2. GIVE.asia (https://give.asia­) is looking for a full-time, remote full stack web developer with 3-5 years of experience in Ruby on Rails, Javascript (preferably with working experience in AngularJS/ ReactJS), HTML5, Sass. Reach out with your CV at aseem_at_giveasia_dot_or­g if interested. -------------- 


Thank You, Sponsors! Food and Drinks:   


Venue:
